treatment-md.title: Phrynopus montium Shreve 1938
treatment-md.article-title: Rediscovery of the Endangered frog Phrynopus montium (Shreve, 1938) (Amphibia, Anura, Craugastoridae) in the cloud forest of central Peru

material-citation.collectedFrom: under rocks in an open area with scattered bushes, moss (Sphagnum sp.), and bunchgrass (Stipa sp.) between the road and a small (<0.5 ha) potato crop
